column2:
Test, test.
Great, the journal function is stable.

Day one. Hibernation is interrupted. The machine is damaged.
Time coordinates: I'm far away from my destination.
And it is wasteland outside...
I need to log out all the days. It's like to write a book.
Can I speak to you, my probable reader?
Maybe you will find this journal.

So, we need to repair the machine.
I am Corus Valott. I'm scared.

Day two.
Night was starry. I could not recognize the constellations.
One of them looks like sharpened Ursa Major, though.
Workshop is clicking and sizzling, making my sleep restless.
Most of all I was looking for those fireball creatures to come.
But they seem to protect the minerals. They sound so weird when chasing the drone...
However, our oxygen is running out.
We must synthetize enough of it and repair the core.

Future people must be waiting for me.

Day three.
The only thing that worries me, my friend, is that I see only desert from all sides.
The cemetery of buildings. Is this really the future? What has happened after my departure?
The guild outpost is ruined. Well, the guildiers felt very comfortable in their VR simulations. Pity I could not.
Miss my sister from there. She’s nice.
People called sister a person who was blood relative. To tell the truth, she talked little, just a little…

I'm sorry, brothers.
Please, hurry. We need to refill the oxygen tank.

I have a Rudolph-Vierke disease. Scientifically it sounds like: induced atrophy with affection on the temporal lobes. Among millions of virtual residents, someone has no luck. I missed the first symptoms. The taste disturbance? We envelop our stomachs with feeders. The sight deterioration? You think your screen is distorting by an accident?..
Некая запись в журнале под номером 2. Показывается во второй день, если прошёл до конца квест "Наружу".
Некая запись в журнале под номером 3. Показывается в любой день, если проанализирован Artifact1.
Некая запись в журнале под номером 4. Показывается во второй половине 3 дня (maxAP = 5).
